title: Neder Pixeleite - New Typeface From brazil
content:
Hello everyboy,

I have worked in the last months in a new design. Please take a look at the link bellow. Critics and suggestions are welcome

**http://www.rafaelneder.com/pixeleite**
author: rafaelneder

comments.content: Rafael, is the size which you have it at on your site the size at which you think it should be used? I personally think you need to also post settings at different sizes so people can see the flaws at the correct size. I'm assuming, obviously, that it should be much smaller.
